name: SPECIALISED AND ADVANCED FOUNDATION OF EDUCATION

address: C/o - SAFE ACADEMY, 2nd Floor, MS Tower
Atwal Real Estate, OT Road, Inda

briefDescription: SAFE was founded with the view to establish, run, foster and continue centre for Education (admit the students in any academic stream of any discipline, research work for the students, taking affiliation from any academic Institutions / Universities, establish and run Polytechnic / Engineering / Technical / Vocational / Professional / Management / Medical / Paramedical Educational Institutes, etc.) for providing Quality Education and Training in the field of various Technological, Managerial and other Advanced & Specialised Courses, to the masses of different levels and status.
